name: copilot
notes:
i love pretty sock yarn so i buy lots of lovelies and then of course, donâ€™t knit socks with them. so when a shawl is too much, i knit copilot which is the sister pattern to autopilot. 

equally simple, this design features a garter stitch section separating the mesh for a little structure on a fingering weight (4ply) cowl. it may be adjusted in both length and width according to your taste. 

the sample (pictured) goes around the neck 3 times and requires 100g of yarn (measures 16cm wide x 180 around). 50g may be used to knit a lovely 1/2 size version.

find link to video from very pink knits for simple stretchy bind off [here][1] or google one that works for you. 



  [1]: https://verypink.com/2015/03/04/simple-stretchy-bind-off/
